name: Bellatto - Edition Brazil - Robusto
additionalNotes:
Bellatto Edition Brazil is actually started life as a private blend for the friends and family of William Ventura, the man behind Tabacalera William Ventura. Tony Bellatto says that after enough whisky and Sprite, he managed to convince Ventura to let him sell the blend. It is branded as Bellatto Edition 
There are two versions of Bellatto Edition, one with a Brazilian wrapper and the other Ecuadorian Connecticut shade—both of which are aimed at being reminiscent of old-school Dominican cigars.
